lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: I can!

lender.name: Lightfoots
lender.loan_because: we can.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do!
lender.occupational_info: I design and sell custom wine cellars.

lender.name: Brittany
lender.loan_because: I have a responsibility to help those less fortunate.

lender.name: Leo
lender.occupational_info: I am a father and, as such, everything I do is for the support, strength, and education of my children. It's important for them to know how to help others no matter where they are.

lender.name: Jim & Liz
lender.loan_because: We hope to make someone's life a little easier. To help those who want to help themselves. Hopefully the loan recipients will be able to "pay it forward" someday.

lender.name: Anthony Garcia
lender.loan_because: I love the idea of lending directly to an indulvidual where 100% of the loan goes right into their business. \"Buy a man a fish you feed him for a day,teach him to fish he eats for a lifetime\"...

lender.name: Rick
lender.loan_because: I participate in this program because it allows me to help other people of the world that are less fortunate and just need a helping hand to create a life for themselves. It is a people-to-people demonstration and commitment to the those in need that other's more fortunate really do care. Empowering women around the world is one of the best way to reduce poverty and population growth in the world as education and economic conditions improve.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: To make positive connections to people in other parts of the world, who are working hard to improve their families and communities.

lender.name: Janel
lender.loan_because: I want to contribute in some small way to uplifting my sisters and brothers around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a graduate university with students and faculty - maintaining records, assisting students and generally ensuring that the school functions well.

lender.name: Christinafiets Hofstad
lender.loan_because: unas paquettas paporras papieras
lender.occupational_info: every beetle has its needle

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: To help others help themselves

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I'm a small business owner and I feel a connection to people trying to start their own business. I love seeing small businesses succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a glass artist/graphic designer. I design websites, business cards, brochures, create animations and edit videos. I also make and sell glass jewelry.

lender.name: Kerry
lender.loan_because: I\'m part of a women\'s reading group that has been together for 24 yrs. We have always done our best to support each other through difficult times. We want to extend that support to others in the hope it will bring to these women, some financial independence and a sense of empowerment. Instead of paying for a book this month, we decided to use our money to put toward a few loans. We are all excited about being part of this micro-loan program.
lender.occupational_info: I find people (mentors) to support young adults, ages 16-21, who have a disability and are leaving high school and want to find jobs or continue on to college.

lender.name: Pico
lender.loan_because: I live in a nice house with a soft, comfortable bed to sleep on. I always have plenty of dog food to eat. Humans are good to me, and I think they should have the opportunity to improve their lives by hard work and dedication. I would like to help those that are interested in helping themselves. Hopefully my small loans can be beneficial to those who need some help.
lender.occupational_info: Fetch the ball.

lender.name: Payton
lender.loan_because: I think it is important to give others the same opportunity to succeed that I\'ve been given.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently a student in business school at London Business School. I am studying entrepreneurship so that one day I can start my own business also.

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: It feels great to empower other entrepreneurs.
lender.occupational_info: As and online marketing and PR specialist, I help businesses optimize their online communications for higher search engine ranking and higher customer conversions.

lender.name: Kiran
lender.loan_because: I\'ve felt the pain of being an independent developer with no money to finance my ideas, and I can understand how much more acute this can be in parts of the world.
lender.occupational_info: I design information spaces.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: It\'s a great way to help others have the opportunities we take for granted in the U.S.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I like the idea that my actions, however small they may be, can have a real impact.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that makes it possible for other businesses to accept money over the internet. The government has many rules and laws about how companies like mine operate. My job is to know these rules and make sure my company follows them.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: I think it is a way to do something that is useful to another individual that is trying to make a better life for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I design and build web sites. I also am a travel agent to help people book travel to different places.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: I know how small loans can make a huge difference to a business.
lender.occupational_info: I help non-profit legal organizations with technology and Internet projects.

lender.name: jeff
lender.loan_because: I find the spirit of optimism among these entrepreneurs inspiring. I'm particularly moved by those doing business in communications and graphic arts because those fields are of personal interest.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a large aerospace company designing graphic communications for presentations, publications, and exhibits. In my free time I love to travel abroad to expand my knowledge of other cultures and add to my photography portfolio.

lender.name: Tyler
lender.loan_because: There are people in this world who need my money more than me.

lender.name: philip
lender.loan_because: I want to help people
lender.occupational_info: I teach children Dance

lender.name: Hannah
lender.loan_because: "It is every man's obligation to put back into the world at least the equivalent of what he takes out of it." - Albert Einstein
lender.occupational_info: I am a college student learning how to teach English as a second Language

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I want to help people to achieve the quality of life they deserve.
lender.occupational_info: I investigate the causes of human diseases and try to find ways to prevent and/or treat them.

lender.name: Lindsey
lender.loan_because: I volunteered in Africa and I have seen how hard the people work, and think they deserve the right to better themselves and their businesses.
lender.occupational_info: I am from the US, but am currently working on my MBA in Sweden.

lender.name: Michael Warden
lender.loan_because: Kiva loans are a great way to make a tangible difference in people's lives. Your money doesn't just go to a bank somewhere, but into the hands of someone who's working hard to make life better for themselves and their family.
lender.occupational_info: I help people redesign their life around their true passions and desires .

lender.name: Sally
lender.loan_because: the stories of the entrepreneurs I am loaning to are compelling, and remind me of my own dreams. People need all sorts of support when they are working for themselves. If I can help someone live a dream and support their family at the same time, by loaning a small (by my standards) amount of money, then that is really pretty exciting.
lender.occupational_info: I am a designer across many disciplines, including books, graphics and other paper products, as well as larger scale projects like buildings and urban spaces. I love to see an idea become a reality- an object I can pick up, or a place I can walk through.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: In a small way, I can relate.
lender.occupational_info: Looking for what is next...

lender.name: Mason
lender.loan_because: I have the great fortune of being able to help.
lender.occupational_info: I do technical writing and editing for a non-profit health care company.

lender.name: Chuck
lender.loan_because: To help others.

lender.name: Meaghan
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone deserves a chance to create a better life for themselves, their families, and their communities.
lender.occupational_info: I create animation for a children's television show.

lender.name: Jeanne
lender.loan_because: It's a great way for me to extend & connect with people i'd love to meet and help but would never have access to do so - I am grateful to Kiva & think Kiva is a fantastic vehicle - Right on!!
lender.occupational_info: I work in a large law firm assisting four great attorneys - busy all day long

lender.name: Larry
lender.loan_because: I believe in the inherent worth and dignity of every person and that we are all part of an interdependent web of existence.\r\n\r\nKiva is an opportunity to respectfully share my gifts with people brave enough to build their own means of support under the most trying of circumstances.

lender.name: Bertrand
lender.loan_because: I believe that lending money to entrepreneurs is the best way to stimulate and improve local economies.
lender.occupational_info: I\'m a civil engineer, I build roads, bridges, buildings, sewers, water systems, etc...

lender.name: Fitz
lender.loan_because: this is the coolest thing ever, to join together to help out our fellow men and women.

lender.name: Mayuresh
lender.loan_because: I can make a difference.

lender.name: Shivani
lender.loan_because: I want to do my small part to help

lender.name: Mom & Requelle
lender.occupation: 3rd yr University Student Single Mom of 2
lender.loan_because: its a christmas gift for my girl Requelle. She\'s 10. She has the biggest heart I just knew she would rather give then recieve. She understands that we are lucky and that there are more people that need more then we have.
lender.occupational_info: I\'m a third year University Student at the University of Winnipeg. I\'m Cree Indian & mother from Mistatawasis First Nations Saskatchewan. I consider myself very fortunate to attend university to further my education and my future opportunities to work with other First Nations women in Canada.\r\n\r\n

lender.name: Andy
lender.loan_because: capitalism works.

lender.name: Xavier
lender.loan_because: I want to support people who are building their communities, since I know I\'ve been given a lot of support in my time.
lender.occupational_info: I do research on social issues, to help people improve their ability to help each other.

lender.name: Darwin & Tami
lender.loan_because: We like to help people
lender.occupational_info: We work in hospitals to help people get well. We have two Sphynx (hairless) cats.

lender.name: Ricka
lender.loan_because: I want to help people become independent.
lender.occupational_info: I help businesses get their names in the newspaper and other media.

lender.name: Jeremy
lender.loan_because: I want to help those who are less fortunate than I am.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a business.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.occupation: Assist to the Director of NIUST Univ of MS
lender.loan_because: It gives me joy.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do. And a tasty way to do it.

lender.name: Cheryl
lender.loan_because: I like helping others to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I teach science and math to 5th grade elementary school students, in the public school system of Utah.

lender.name: Jzzz
lender.loan_because: you do.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I am interested in assisting other business owners. I\'m especially interested in women who own businesses and who also raise children. I have my own company and have two children and so I know it can be a stuggle some days and others it is extremely rewarding. I\'m fortunate to be able to have money to loan and only hope that it will help someone else and if it helps them to become self-sufficient that is even better.
lender.occupational_info: I do public relations for travel clients. That means that hotels, resorts, spas, tour operators, and countries hire me to promote them in US based newspapers, magazines and on television. I have had done a lot of traveling with my work around the world.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: I can not only contribute to a third world economy, but also respect the dignity of the people that live and work there. Giving is great, but loaning without interest can be even better!
lender.occupational_info: I'm a mechanical engineer

lender.name: Anne Marie
lender.loan_because: I can make a difference to someone who really needs it!

lender.name: Jonathan & Tammy
lender.loan_because: Traveling is our passion and we are constantly humbled by the kindness and compassion of people all over the world.

lender.name: Doug
lender.loan_because: Small business makes America great and we should spread that over the world instead of warfare.
lender.occupational_info: Unlike many people in the world, I no longer need to work for money. As a retired American, I'm free to work for the things I care most about.

lender.name: Maureen
lender.loan_because: I love seeing how a small amount of money loaned out, repaid, and loaned out again and again can make a huge difference in so many lives.

lender.name: The Real Estate Company
lender.loan_because: Loaning money to assist another human being expand their ability to work for themselves and increase their quality of life seems right.
lender.occupational_info: We assist individuals in the purchasing and selling of land, residential, commercial and investment properties on the Central Coast of California.

lender.name: Kristen
lender.occupational_info: I research new food products to see if consumers will like them before they are introduced.

lender.name: Jen
lender.loan_because: I have a small biz in the U.S. and I want to share my good fortune with others who don't necessarily have the access to the same resources that I do. I also write a blog called Indie Fixx on which I celebrate independent artists, designers, and crafters worldwide.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: It makes me happy to help someone who is striving to better his/her life. It often takes so little to make a huge difference in people's lives.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: just giving back
lender.occupational_info: I fix computers

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: I was lucky enough to be born somewhere with more wealth than some other places in the world. I care about other human beings, all around the world. And because it is pure luck that I have what I have, I want to give it to others who have worked hard for what they have.
lender.occupational_info: I teach at a university in Los Angeles, California, United States. I teach philosophy.

lender.name: Ken
lender.loan_because: I believe in the work these indviduals are doing to support their families.

lender.name: PSC 140 IR
lender.loan_because: In our class here at Canisius College we study International Relations -- including economic development -- and we want to make a positive difference in the lives of entrepreneurs in the developing world.

lender.name: Andy
lender.loan_because: this money can make a huge difference to the success of these people's businesses.

lender.name: John & Cecilia
lender.loan_because: In Canada we have a lot of opportunity and we loan because we would like to try and provide others with opportunity to succeed.

lender.name: Alejandra
lender.loan_because: God has blessed my husband and I and I beleive it's our time to help others.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I am compassionate and feel strongly about free enterprise to eliminate poverty.
lender.occupational_info: Computer Software. It takes me around the world for a great new perspective on life.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: Because it is my hope that this small act of help may enrich the lives of those that receive it as much as Jesus has enriched and blessed my life.

lender.name: Kronlund Family
lender.loan_because: We want a world where nobody goes to bed hungry and because we want to lend our support to these hard-working entrepreneurs who are an inspiration!
lender.occupational_info: I'm originaly from El Salvador, and my husband is from Canada. We have 2 beautiful and healthy children. Our family has been blessed! We wish to make a difference in someone's life. Thanks to Kiva we can do just that!

lender.name: monica
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: geordie
lender.loan_because: I'm an enterpreneur, and I like to help out other entrepreneur's as much as I can. I believe entrepreneur's are the people that make things happen.

lender.name: Rickie
lender.loan_because: I, my family and friends all have more than enough. We must, as a nation, begin to be more generous. This is a start to help other have enough.
lender.occupational_info: I was an Associate Superintendent in a fairly large Urban School District. I retired in July to make quilts, build, spend time with my dogs and other luscious things.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate financially and need to share it with those who are not. There are so many people in the world that are struggling, and we should help them.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I want to support organic economic growth.
lender.occupational_info: I design experiences for people.

lender.name: Lori
lender.loan_because: I care!
lender.occupational_info: I have a shop in which I sell books, coffee, stationery and a variety of gift items.

lender.name: Canadore Radio Students
lender.loan_because: Radio Students at Canadore College North Bay, Ontario, Canada recognize that education is a life altering experience. They want to make change for others, even in a small way, by demonstrating their social responsibility by making a loan.
lender.occupational_info: We operate a college radio station in North Bay, Ontario, Canada. Teachers and staff help to direct students in their daily radio station operations. Students also participate in regular classes.

lender.name: anya
lender.loan_because: It is important to think of others in this world, to care and support.
lender.occupational_info: I am single mom and a nursing student. I am working towards a better future for me and my baby Maya.

lender.name: Penelope
lender.loan_because: I am and have been helped by so many people and I wanted to keep that help flow going. My income is very low [by U.S.A. standards] but I am happy to share a part of my income with women in business.
lender.occupational_info: My volunteer work involves tutoring elementary school children, working with the local humane society and giving automobile rides to people who normally ride the bus.

lender.name: chris
lender.loan_because: RU kind? yes

lender.name: SAMCO International
lender.loan_because: The employees of SAMCO want to help entrepreneurs in less developed countries to succeed. The Founder of our company, Mr. Osamu Tsuji, was a young entrepeneur in 1979 and he succeeded in establishing what is now a growing company devoted to semiconductor equipment manufacturing. We would like others to have the opportunity to follow in his footsteps.

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: I want to help other kid\'s parents.
lender.occupational_info: I\'m in 2nd grade. I have to clean off the table, take out the garbage and stay out of my mother\'s hair.

lender.name: Chloe
lender.occupation: UNESCO, Education for All International Team
lender.occupational_info: communications, advocacy, program implementation and translation work specializing in the field of public health and education.

lender.name: Tina Marie
lender.loan_because: It is incredibly exciting and satisfying to see microfinance helping people in need, who otherwise would not have any other opportunities.
lender.occupational_info: Developing partnerships to increase revenue and sales.

lender.name: Catherine
lender.loan_because: I feel proud to support businesses run by industrious entrepreneurs like the ones I find on Kiva.
lender.occupational_info: I am a new lawyer who is learning about the laws of buying and selling land in the United States. Once I learn enough, I will write documents for people buying land--some of them may even be starting their own business.

lender.name: Pedro
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: When I'm not looking for ways to empower fellow indie artists, I enjoy creating and recording my own musical compositions.

lender.name: Clay
lender.loan_because: My dad wants me to develop a sense of social responsibility. Kiva is like a game for me and so my father is attempting to associate positive feelings with giving. He believes he is creating a mental connection between my happiness and my giving to others.
lender.occupational_info: It's a tough day at the office for me. I am constantly developing social skills. I am also learning how to cope with authority while questioning it. Additionally, I am learning that education is important.

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: we have so few opportunities to change the world. KIVA is a great avenue to affect small changes in other's worlds.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a great credit union, I attend evening classes at Universidad de Nuevo Mexico, and I enjoy cooking. Go Lobos!!!!

lender.name: Matt & Mary
lender.loan_because: We want to encourage success and help people in need, and because God gives to us so we can share with others.

lender.name: Benjamin
lender.loan_because:
Thereâs a quote from Willy Wonka and the Chocolate Factory.
âSo shines a good deed in a weary worldâ
This is my good deedâ¦
lender.occupational_info: I gain visibility for companies by helping them to get in newspapers and on television.

lender.name: Janice
lender.loan_because: I want to honor my late husband. I want to help someone else. It makes me feel good.

lender.name: Dick
lender.loan_because: A friend in NYC told me about Kiva, and I thought maybe I can help too. I now know that I can.

lender.name: 5 Lenks
lender.loan_because: I think everyone should do something to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I help victims of crime through the court system.

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: I am very blessed to have seen so many of my dreams come true. It makes me happy to help other women achieve their dreams, too. May all women be free, happy, healthy, safe, and successful. May all girls be educated. And may all women on Earth enjoy loving partnerships with the men in their lives.

lender.name: Carolyn
lender.loan_because: I believe that these micro-loans through the wonderful service Kiva is providing is a powerful way to help people help themselves - a way I can help others that\'s significant to each recipient.

lender.name: Kim & Family
lender.loan_because: \"As for the rich in this present age, charge them not to be haughty, nor to set their hopes on the uncertainty of riches, but on God, who richly provides us with everything to enjoy. They are to do good, to be rich in good works, to be generous and ready to share, thus storing up treasure for themselves as a good foundation for the future, so that they may take hold of that which is truly life.\" 1 Timothy 6:17-19

lender.name: Dolores
lender.loan_because: I know what it\'s like to have an idea but no money to put it into action. This gives me great satisfaction to be able to help get someone else's idea put into action.

lender.name: Vanessa and Sonny
lender.loan_because: Its the right thing to do. To be able to help someone start, grow or rebuild there business is a blessing returned.This is the most rewarding way to contribute back my small part to the world. I love what Kiva stands for, I love this cause.
lender.occupational_info: My company is a service provider in the Office Furniture Industry. We install many different types of office settings for Commercial, Government & Healthcare Faciilities.

lender.name: Kris & Andy
lender.loan_because: we can! This is an easy way to make a big difference in someone's life.

lender.name: ParsonsChancellor Family
lender.loan_because: We are blessed while helping people to create more opportunities for themselves.

lender.name: Samuel & Joyce
lender.loan_because: It requires so little to help so much
lender.occupational_info: Retired corporate executive

lender.name: Jan
lender.loan_because: I want to see women be sucessful
lender.occupational_info: I raise money for environmental issues in Arizona

lender.name: Jameson
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of helping another individual with a specific need or goal. I think the world is a very small place, and the ability to help out someone in this way makes it seem even smaller.
lender.occupational_info: I help people who are in acute need either physically or psychologically. I help people find the services they need in my community, I support them emotionally and provide treatment for mental illness. Most of my work is with gay people or people with chronic diseases.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: it is a cutting edge approach to reducing world poverty and encouraging people to become successful.
lender.occupational_info: Communications director

lender.name: Kent
lender.loan_because: saw program on Frontline and believe in these types of loans.
lender.occupational_info: I work with all types of medical vaccine development, research, and promotion.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I Can and I should !

lender.name: Dawn
lender.loan_because: they inspire me.
lender.occupational_info: I coordinate all the details for large events like conventions or concerts.

lender.name: Christina
lender.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I teach second grade (7 and 8 year-olds). I love having a job that involves helping people better themselves everyday.

lender.name: Michael & Katy
lender.loan_because: We'd like to affect direct social change, bypassing the politics and corruption of government to government aide.
lender.occupational_info: I help facilitate the downloading of software programs from my company's website.

lender.name: claudia
lender.loan_because: it's necesary, I can & I want to do it :)
lender.occupational_info: I am lucky and grateful to be able to do Art, sculptural or functional with different mediums. I do mosaics, creatures and objects, see them at http://www.claudiaNagy.com or

lender.name: Sue
lender.loan_because: It's a good way to help.

lender.name: SMistry
lender.loan_because: Micro-credit is a great way to help people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I create websites.

lender.name: Melanie
lender.loan_because: I envision a world of equality in which everyone has the same opportunities for prosperity.
lender.occupational_info: I am a graphic designer. I design books, brochures, etc.

lender.name: Ben
lender.loan_because: Grass roots is the most effective form of change.

lender.name: bill
lender.loan_because: it feels good to help others

lender.name: Penny
lender.loan_because: People everywhere should assist one another so that we all can make it a better place to live. I feel I have been fortunate in my life and really want to share with others who are trying to make their lives better.

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: Promoting economic progress in the developing world is critical for global stability.
lender.occupational_info: Software development and software security.

lender.name: Karin
lender.loan_because: I want do do what I can to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I teach adults to take care of teir body, mind and soul.

lender.name: Sean & Shauna
lender.occupation: Microcredit Program Associate & R & D Specialist
lender.loan_because: Sean - I have seen firsthand the power of Microcredit and the hopelessness that poverty breeds.\r\n\r\nShauna - It will make a difference in one person\'s life and to that one person it means the world.
lender.occupational_info: Sean - I work on various projects at the Microcredit Summit Campaign. We plan conferences where Microfinance Institutions can learn more about outreach and best practices. We acquire data from thousands of Microfinance Institutions around the world and compile it into the most comprehensive report on microcredit outreach. We also provide bold goals for the microcredit industry.\r\n\r\nShauna - I work with scientists who are researching ways to help the everyday person in the medical field.

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.occupational_info: Volunteer editor at Kiva

lender.name: Liz
lender.loan_because: I believe in the role of microfinance in development and I have the means to help.
lender.occupational_info: I plan events for a state university in order to help raise money for scholarships.

lender.name: mike
lender.loan_because: I feel blessed and want to share my good fortune with others. This seems to be a powerful idea, lending to others to empower them.
lender.occupational_info: I am mostly retired but work part time helping people with disabilities and elderly people.

lender.name: Andy
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do

lender.name: Dawn
lender.loan_because: Microfinancing is the best tool we have to eradicate poverty worldwide. It may be a slow process, this changing lives one loan at a time, but its a better vehicle for improving the quality of life in developing nations than anything else that's been tried over the years.
lender.occupational_info: I represent poor people in criminal cases ("If you cannot afford a lawyer, one will be appointed for you" - - - that's me).

lender.name: Wendy
lender.loan_because: I believe we can each make a difference is this world!

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because: I want to help others succeed
lender.occupational_info: Pediatrician

lender.name: Lana
lender.loan_because: I am so fortunate in my life. I have everything that my family needs or wants. I am a Christian, and to me that means I must share what I have been given.
lender.occupational_info: I create and design visual communication such as logos and brochures for non-profit organizations.

lender.name: Tammy & Mike
lender.loan_because: Because we believe in these individuals and we wish to see them succeed.
lender.occupational_info: Managing a work force, paying bills and taxes, estimating selling prices, doing payroll, bookkeeping, taking care of customers and solving problems for customers and staff

lender.name: WCBC
lender.loan_because: Our Firm has a proud history of supporting organizations that help those in need. This year, we continue to assist entrepreneurs in the developing world.
lender.occupational_info: Our firm determines how much and how to pay people. We have provided assistance to hundreds of organizations in the private, public and not-for-profit sectors for over 30 years.

lender.name: Dimitri
lender.loan_because: "What you leave behind is not what is engraved in stone monuments, but what is woven into the lives of others." -Pericles

lender.name: Shaw Treatment
lender.loan_because: small actions can have large, positive, and lasting effects.
lender.occupational_info: Brad & Michelle: In 2004 we proudly cofounded a social enterprise ~ Shaw Treatment, a body care products company, donating 100% profits to grass roots charities working in Africa. Better options lead to better choices. Together we can and are making the world a better place! ~ M & B

lender.name: Denise
lender.loan_because: In Honor of Howard Faughn, barber, Metropolis, IL (Paducah, KY)

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: It\'s a great idea.
lender.occupational_info: I manufacture and sell dog biscuits.

lender.name: Jan
lender.loan_because: Everyone should have a chance to have a good life.
lender.occupational_info: I teach high school science classes.

lender.name: Tamiko
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I think its a fantastic idea!
lender.occupational_info: Computer programmer

lender.name: Justin
lender.loan_because: I love the direct connection with an individual - making a difference to a real person and that it's such an efficient way of donating.
lender.occupational_info: I work with companies in the UK to help them change their culture towards coaching and empowerment to help unlock people\'s full potential!\r\nI\'ve also travelled through Africa and Asia and have a passion to help the world become a more fair and just place for everyone.

lender.name: Ray
lender.loan_because: It\'s the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: Computer related services.

lender.name: deborah
lender.loan_because: I was raised to believe in helping where I can.
lender.occupational_info: I represent poor people charged with crimes.

lender.name: Maria
lender.occupational_info: Urban planner

lender.name: Ayemya
lender.loan_because: even a little will contribute a lot to someone else life. I try to help as much as I can even though I don't have much.

lender.name: phil
lender.loan_because: a loan provides support/encouragement to the borrower as an \"agreement between equals\" whereas a gift infers an unequal status between borrower and recipient. I believe that the amount of loans ultimately advanced will exceed all prior expectations and have a real impact on lifting people out of poverty.

lender.name: Jesse
lender.loan_because: âLight is the task where many share the toil.â\r\n- Homer
lender.occupational_info: I am a computer programmer/business owner.

lender.name: Caitlyn
lender.loan_because: people feel and do better when they control what they are doing. Loans are a great way to give more options.

lender.name: forston
lender.loan_because: Think its a great idea that benifits the world.

lender.name: Nesrin
lender.loan_because: helping anyone raise themselves out of poverty is not only important but an obligation tor anyone who has the means to.
lender.occupational_info: I am a jewellery designer and run a small retail store.

lender.name: Cindy
lender.occupational_info: Engineer

lender.name: Joseph
lender.loan_because: People have been very good to me all my life. This is just one way for me to give something back and help someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I coach Presidents and CEOs of service based companies helping them to improve their sales, profits and teams

lender.name: Tom & Deanna
lender.loan_because: we can

lender.name: Jeremy
lender.loan_because: As a business owner I can appreciate the desire to work for yourself. I also know how much of a struggle starting a business can be even in a prosperous country such as Canada. I love to see people trying to improve their situation.

lender.name: Laurie
lender.loan_because: itâs greatly satisfying to help people help themselves

lender.name: Deborah & Gary
lender.occupational_info: Deerfield Bch Florida

lender.name: Jaime
lender.loan_because: I care about the well being of others around the world. With all the resources that we have, extreme poverty should not exist. We can all help to alleviate this major unnecessary issue.
lender.occupational_info: I have recently graduated from the University of Houston-Downtown with BA in English. For the moment, I am a full time assistant manager at Dessert Gallery bakery and cafe. I also have the privelege to be able to run a small cake business every weekend.

lender.name: Lewis
lender.loan_because: it connects people
lender.occupational_info: i work for an IT management company

lender.name: Carin
lender.loan_because: There is minimal over head, and my money goes directly to someone who needs it based on my decision. I can watch the progress of the project and see how the money is used.
lender.occupational_info: I help financial companies create process efficiencies.

lender.name: Chris and Trista
lender.loan_because: There is no reason not to.
lender.occupational_info:
Chris researches medical imaging technology.
Trista studies art and visual culture.

lender.name: Sam
lender.loan_because: More than a few have taken a chance on me and my hope at that time was that one day I would do the same for another.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I love the power the Internet gives us to share our opinions and even our money with people all over the world.
lender.occupational_info: I use the Internet to reach out to people around the world to discuss my company's products and services.

lender.name: Rabbi Adar
lender.loan_because: "Tzedek, tzedek tirdof" -- "Justice, justice you shall pursue!"
lender.occupational_info: I study and teach Jewish texts.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: People need to help each other, at home and across the world. This is how we can be respectful of the joys and opportunities we have as humans sharing this world.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the US Postal Service on the computer systems that support the telephone call centers. I have also worked at motorcycle repair shops, finance companies, and architect firms designing stores and houses. My favorite hobby is building guitars.

lender.name: Steven
lender.loan_because: everyone should have a chance to follow a dream, of doing it on their own -- so lend a hand.
lender.occupational_info: I sit at a computer screen -- and type for hours.

lender.name: Henry
lender.loan_because: It makes sense. It\'s easy to understand how this can make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a filmmaker with in interest in social issues.

lender.name: Jennifer & Patrick
lender.loan_because: We enjoy seeing other people work hard and be successful.

lender.name: Lynnwood Dennys
lender.loan_because: The employees of Lynnwood Dennys care.
lender.occupational_info: We are the crew of Lynnwood Dennys, which is an restaurant in Washington State US.

lender.name: Dominic
lender.loan_because: I believe that every little bit counts. I\'m excited to see how these business owners around the world step up to the challenge and I will be cheering them on.
lender.occupational_info: I am a mechanical engineer. I work for a contract company that develops products for various industries. Some of these products include parking meters, measurement equipment, avionics, enclosures, molds, etc...

lender.name: Manchi
lender.loan_because: I\'ve been donating to various charities for years, I found Kiva to be innovative, extremly easy and attractive to use.

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: I learned about Kiva in one of my political science classes at the University of Wisconsin-Madison. I loan because I think it is a wonderful way to make connections with other people around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently in school studying politics and communications. I am hoping to pursue a career in a non-profit organization once I graduate.

lender.name: Vegan in California
lender.loan_because: I saw the special on PBS\' Frontline and was drawn to what I saw. It seemed to make more sense to help other people support themselves than to buy unneeded consumer items for myself or friends and family.
lender.occupational_info: I work for an agency that administers the mental health component of health care services for low income individuals receiving coverage from a county government source. Customer service excellence is my passion! Government bureaucracy does not have to mean cold, impersonal, slow, or uncaring and inefficient service.

lender.name: Keun
lender.loan_because: I always wanted to help out globally. Yes, I know there are less fortunate people here as well, but I\'ve realized that even with insignificant amount of money I can help people start their own buseinss.

lender.name: Abe
lender.loan_because: This is the greatest website. The difference that I can hopefully make by lending people money is exciting and rewarding.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the typical American corporation were hard work and dedication means very little, beside that I love my job and the people who i work with.

lender.name: Nellie
lender.loan_because: I want these entrepreneurs to access cash without being beholden to loan sharks with exorbitant interest rates, so that they can grow their business and improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I am the principal investigator of a cardiovascular research group at an academic medical center. We investigate the cell and molecular mechanisms leading to heart attack and stroke.

lender.name: Laurie
lender.loan_because: I am so blessed.I would like others to have the chance to feel empowered, and in turn, they can \"pay it forward\".
lender.occupational_info: I teach my children to be kind and giving by setting an example for them.

lender.name: Geoff
lender.loan_because: A good idea, hard work, capital and good people mixed together create opportunies no matter where you are.
lender.occupational_info: I lend money to small businesses alongs Maine's midcoast.

lender.name: TCU CEO
lender.loan_because: We loan because we care. It is that simple. TCU CEO is a successful organization of student entrepreneurs that hope to assist struggling entrepreneurs in developing countries. This micro-lending initiative allows us to learn and assist at the same time.
lender.occupational_info: TCU CEO is the student managed entrepreneurship organization at Texas Christian University in Fort Worth, Texas, USA. TCU CEO has a passion for assisting entrepreneurs in developing countries. We hope to encourage other university entrepreneurship clubs around the world to join us in partnering with KIVA. The TCU CEO microlending initiative enables students to give to the international community while learning at the same time.

lender.name: Richard
lender.occupational_info: Sales for an online career site.\r\n\r\nI am 20 years old and I have been on my own since im 18. I have a LOT of credit card debt and I am trying not to ruin my life, I do want a house one day. I am in desperate need.

lender.name: Joseph
lender.loan_because: It\'s the whole \"give a man a fish\" principal
lender.occupational_info: The world looks much smaller from 40,000 ft.

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: Knowing a small $ amount, pooled together with other like minded people, could make such a difference for someone in a difficult situation - I couldn\\\'t pass it up.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: You can only keep what you have by giving it away!
lender.occupational_info: I am now a buisness partner in world commerce. The diversified business people I invest with are doing good things in bringing water to those who do not have it, clothes to those who need them, and farm fresh produce to the hungry. And on the 2nd round of lending: Fishing in Samoa, Cows in Azerbijan, Pigs in Vietnam, & Chicken in Peru! It just reminds me that God is good all the time!

lender.name: Carl & Marcy
lender.loan_because: This is just a great program to be a part of. It's that simple

lender.name: scott
lender.loan_because: Ambitious, hard working people deserve a chance!

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I understand how hard it is to get the first bit of capital needed to get your business off the ground.
lender.occupational_info: I buy and sell heavy construction equipment made in Japan.

lender.name: Arthur
lender.loan_because: where would I be without the help and blessings I have received along my way in life, I need to do some payback.
lender.occupational_info: I help schedule the products (lawn mowers) that the company I work for makes and then sells

lender.name: Rey
lender.occupational_info: Power plant operator

lender.name: St Alphonsus School
lender.loan_because: we are called by our faith to serve others.
lender.occupational_info: We are a Catholic elementary school

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: I feel I should walk the talk.
lender.occupational_info: When people have problems with their computers, I fix it. When businesses have problems with their big computers, I fix it.

lender.name: nancy
lender.loan_because: In 1964-65, I was a Peace Corps teacher in Kenya in the first group to go to East Africa. I taught English, history, and art to girls in a secondary school in Misikhu, near Broderick Falls and 35 miles from Kitale and Eldoret. One of those girls became minister of agriculture in the \'90s; about the others, I know nothing. But I saw at first hand what a difference education can make in the lives of women, and therefore men. \r\n\r\nI also saw what it meant to live by subsistance farming--having barely enough to eat and no cash at all. I hope that loans such as this one can help people in Kenya make their way to financial security for themselves and their families.

lender.name: Marina & Aaron
lender.loan_because: We believe in the power of sharing and helping others.
lender.occupational_info: We try to help make the world a better place by passing on the love, resources and opportunities with which we have been blessed.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: The show on TV really touched me. I picked Ivy because we are in the same buisness and I know how hard it is to stay open.
lender.occupational_info: I amd the owner of a hair salon in Kansas City Missouri and I run the day to day buisness operations

lender.name: Eileen
lender.loan_because: I love entrepreneurship and will do what I can to foster that spirit worldwide.

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: I want to support anyone who wants to support themselves, whether it be my family, friends, or anyone around the world through Kiva!
lender.occupational_info: Simply put, I help companies protect their information and their customers\' information from people who shouldn\'t have it. This involves lots of computers, documentation, and long, boring meetings, but I like it and it allows me to live in London (currently) and travel to India and Africa.

lender.name: Debra
lender.loan_because: I have been so Blessed in my life. It is so rewarding to be able to help others in their endeavors.

lender.name: Cari
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Rick
lender.loan_because: I believe capitalism helps people by promoting freedom, self-worth, happiness, wealth and democracy.
lender.occupational_info: I invest in people and businesses with high growth potential.

lender.name: Our family
lender.loan_because: It is a way for our family to impact lives of those wishing to work to change their own lives
lender.occupational_info: Businessman husband, jewelry designer wife, 2 high school children (one is on loan to us as an AFS student) and 1 middle school student

lender.name: Denise
lender.loan_because: I admire initiative, energy, and creativity in people.
lender.occupational_info: I volunteer on Boards of Directors that assist in providing affordable housing for the elderly

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I felt personally inspired to do my part for struggling people in strugglng nations. How can I have so much and not care for those who don\'t. \"Because I have been given much I too must give.\"
lender.occupational_info: Student at a University

lender.name: Carolyn
lender.loan_because: Sometimes we all need a little help.
lender.occupational_info: I have a wonderful job as a legal assistant.

lender.name: Jacob
lender.loan_because: In honor of my grandmother for Christmas 06. God has supplied her with all she needs and this will please her more than any other gift I could give.
lender.occupational_info: I am a soldier in the war on pestilence!\r\nPlumbers help protect the health of nations!

lender.name: Donald
lender.loan_because: of my desire to help others as a follower of Christ, and because of my interest in microenterprise development.
lender.occupational_info: College professor teaching business courses in the areas of management, nonprofit and international trade in Chicago(www.tiu.edu).

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I lend because I can.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a a non-profit consultancy in New York. We work in resource-dependent to promote the management of natural resource revenues for the public good.

lender.name: 7 Land Park Women
lender.occupation: 5 educators, a realtor, and a manager

lender.name: lisa
lender.loan_because: If I can help someone in some small way that makes a wonderful difference in their lives....then I will do it.
lender.occupational_info: I am an artist and I do catering occaisionally. I also make specialty cakes for specail occaisions.

lender.name: John
lender.occupational_info: T.V. and Film acting

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: It\'s the best way to help people in the world without charges.\r\nIt\'s one of the major role of the internet.\r\nMake relations between distant guys

lender.name: Johan
lender.loan_because: I will try to make this world a better place, both economically, ecologically and socially sustainable... everything and everyone is interconnected...
lender.occupational_info:
I make images and music and films that hopefully will make other people stop and think.
i am sharing my music to others: myspace.com/Latki animations: youtube.com/JohanLatki

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I want to give people the opportunity to make a living with dignity.
lender.occupational_info: I volunteer in a store that sells fairly traded crafts made by artisans from over 35 countries.

lender.name: Jennifer & Fremont
lender.loan_because: It's a very small world.

lender.name: Kristan & Family
lender.loan_because: We received a gift certificate.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: People outside the U.S. need help a lot more than us Americans need it.
lender.occupational_info: I help clean up the environment by cleaning up hazardous waste sites.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: If you think you're too small to make a difference try sleeping in a closed room with a mosquito, or give kiva.org a try.

lender.name: Angela
lender.loan_because: I feel it\'s my moral responsibility. People helping people...I LOVE IT. You don\'t have to be a celebrity with lots of money to help someone. I can\'t afford much, but what I can give I do with all my heart. I feel blessed and wish the same for you.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a union that represents trade workers. Basically, I do all the adminstrative things necessary in an office, whether it\'s paying bills, reconciling accounts, typing letters, etc.

lender.name: Stuart
lender.occupational_info: I'm a writer and editor.

lender.name: Robyn
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Volunteer.

lender.name: Our Family
lender.loan_because: We have all been blessed to have lived in Canada in peace, in prosperity and have a wealth of food and needs being met. We want to share.
lender.occupational_info: We are agricultural specialitsts, engineer, teachers, retired Christian Minister, lay Christian ministers, home-makers, farmers, IT persons, students

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I want to help people in need.
lender.occupational_info: I travel and help at my church.

lender.name: Nico
lender.loan_because: I have a deep desire to make the place we call home, better.
lender.occupational_info: I optimize and develop new products. I specifically do research in the pharmaceutical industry.

lender.name: MARLITO
lender.loan_because: I grew up in the Philippines and have seen first hand the living conditions that many impoverished people live in. I also know that most are willing to work hard to improve their life, especially the lives of their children, if only given that \"ONE CHANCE\". I know that most people in the world believe that everyone deserves a shot at being happy, and that most are willing to lend a helping hand to our fellow man. I believe in the old saying, \"Give a man a fish and he will eat for a day. Teach a man to fish and he will eat for a lifetime.\"
lender.occupational_info: I am a pediatric nurse working with children who have cancer or heart conditions in a hospital setting. There is too much suffering in the world, and we can all do well by lessening it through wonderful organizations like Kiva.

lender.name: Chris Stewart
lender.loan_because: After I listened to the Venture Voice podcast featuring Kiva, I was overjoyed because I have been waiting for a site like this to go online for years. Micro-finance is an incredible tool in the eradication of poverty and uplifting of individual self-worth and dignity. It\ is a personal honor to contribute time and resources to this cause.
lender.occupational_info: I am a business intelligence developer at a mid-size Texas-based insurance company located in the DFW Metroplex. Being a part of Kiva fits in perfectly with my desire to help others by empowering them to help themselves.

lender.name: Michael & Kim
lender.loan_because: we are blessed to be a blessing

lender.name: Michael Ezell
lender.loan_because: The only thing people want to do, after having their needs met, is to make a difference. Investment in the wellbeing of another is an investment in one's own wellbeing.
lender.occupational_info: I help people to get fit and healthy. I also show them how to help others to meet their fitness goals and earn a profit in the process.

lender.name: Joseph
lender.loan_because: I am a brother to everyone on the planet and am can think of no greater joy than to help and lift others.
lender.occupational_info: We help people learn to communicate better, and influence change in a way that improves companies, families, communities, nations and lives.

lender.name: Higginbothams
lender.loan_because: The best way to help someone to gain financial independence is to give them the tools to succeed, not a handout-a helping hand. Our family loves to lend!

lender.name: Scott & Julie
lender.loan_because: Muhammad Yunus and Grameen Bank have shown that it works.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Visiting Professor who teaches business ethics. My wife is a technology coordinator for a public school

lender.name: Mike & Deb C.
lender.loan_because: hard-working people everywhere deserve a chance to have a better life.

lender.name: Juliette
lender.loan_because: I want to help people become independent, here or outside of the country. I help people with HIV here in salt Lake City, but I think my dollar can go much further elsewhere (since I am not Bill Gates ! )
lender.occupational_info: I am independently employed as a freelance writer for Sewing publications in the USA

lender.name: Ron & Kathleen
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a little help from their friends, the wealth should be shared
lender.occupational_info: Helping people write stories about their life

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: The scary clowns under my bed make me.

lender.name: Catherine
lender.loan_because: I love business!

lender.name: Fergie
lender.loan_because: I understand the pride in owning a business. I have been very lucky in my life and want to share it with hard working individuals who have not been as fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: I own a food processing company

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I would like to help eliminate poverty, and change lives.
lender.occupational_info: Sell food to Restuarants.

lender.name: Gerrit
lender.loan_because: This is my small contribution to bring more love to this world
lender.occupational_info: I work at the reception of a hotel, at night, to review charges, enter reservations into the database, prepare invoices to tour operators, check in/out clients, close shift/day, statistics, archive

lender.name: Neil McKibben
lender.loan_because: I am the future

lender.name: The Pigott Family
lender.loan_because: Having been to Africa, we know a little goes a long way.
lender.occupational_info: We work to inform the next generation that even one person can make a great difference.

lender.name: Sterling
lender.loan_because: After someone hit me over the head and made me realize that such a small amount of my money could help someone else so much, I had to.

lender.name: Jeanne
lender.loan_because: I believe that each of us deserves a chance to improve our lives. My hope is to help someone like myself: a single mom working hard to support her child(ren).
lender.occupational_info: I work in an office and export food products to other countries. The best part of my job is communicating with people all over the world.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: It is uplifting to support the hard work and determination of those who are overcoming hardship and challenges much greater than I have experienced.
lender.occupational_info: I am a manager of technology for a large office products retailer that has businesses in North America, Europe, Asia and South America

lender.name: Rob and Carrie
lender.loan_because: it\'s an opportunity to share Christ\'s love by helping others.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I'm not rich is an understatement but I certainly feel blessed and fortunate so I'm happy to help someone less fortunate to realize their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I'm currently a self employed drywall man, painter, and general handyman. I hope to start a small green building company specializing in earthbag construction. Eventually I'd like to go to areas affected by hurricanes, earthquakes, etc. to help build these structures.

lender.name: Dawn
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Our Giving Tree
lender.loan_because: I am Jeunesse's mother. I loaned in her name because she is a wonderful daughter who has given so many others so much of her time and love. Especially me. So this is in her honor.

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping others and hope to do my part in making the world a better place to live.
lender.occupational_info: I teach volunteers at an aquarium about marine life and ocean conservation.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: it feels great to help someone, and to appreciate my blessings.

lender.name: Julia
lender.loan_because: I believe in entrepreneurship. I also believe that thriving economies for all will be the only path to global peace.
lender.occupational_info: I recently retired from a position where I facilitated training programs and job opportunities for people who were unemployed or underemployed. Presently I am starting my own business, a small cafe collocated with my son's coffee roasting business

lender.name: Kenneth
lender.loan_because: It feels good to add a little positive energy.... giving business a jump start.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I want to do my little part in this world to plant a seed and show others that there are people who care about their well-being.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a construction company doing payroll and other secretarial skills.

lender.name: Margie & Michael
lender.loan_because: We want to share our blessings
lender.occupational_info: We are both business owners that work long and hard to serve our customers.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: I little bit can help another in volumes.
lender.occupational_info: I help to make the dreams of others possible.

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: I'd like to make a difference as I have been blessed to live in Canada.
lender.occupational_info: I manage infrastructure programs that provide funding to British Columbian communities for their water, sewer, roads, etc. projects.

lender.name: dena
lender.loan_because: I care and want to help.

lender.name: dena
lender.loan_because: i want to help countries and people who are willing to try to make a difference in their lives.

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: I started my business with a partner 15 years ago and understand how hard the process can be, even when you have access to some capital. Micro lending is a great way to help people that really want to achieve.

lender.name: Marc
lender.loan_because: People lent money to me to start a company when I needed the money.
lender.occupational_info: I work with entrepreneurs, helping them to become more successful.

lender.name: Sage
lender.loan_because: I want to reach out and touch another hand.
lender.occupational_info: I attend sixth grade. I am very good at writing and enjoy learning about science. I hope to be the first Asian President of the United States.

lender.name: Joseph
lender.occupational_info: My sole purpose in being a \"professional dancer\" is to present the art of movement on stage, create dances in a rehearsal studio, teach school students the art of expressing themselves through creative movement, to travel around the world performing selected pieces that are unique to the way in which society views particular issues and (for myself) to do what I have ALWAYS dreamed of being, doing and pursuing!!

lender.name: Jascha Narveson
lender.loan_because: I think it's a good idea!
lender.occupational_info: i'm currently working on a PhD in music composition.

lender.name: Ketchum-Watson Group
lender.loan_because: In honor of two of our colleagues; to honor their spirit of giving.
lender.occupational_info: We are a group of faculty/staff at Greenfield Community College who are in the "business" of helping people help themselves so they can make their dreams come true.

lender.name: Joe & Shannon
lender.occupational_info: Joe: I research medical devices used to look at the heart. Shannon: I work as a physical therapist. I help people with joint or muscle problems.

lender.name: Michael&Kaysu&Leo&Philip
lender.loan_because: microfinance and entrepreneurs - a great idea
lender.occupational_info: A system administrator takes care of the computers and networking equipment that makes a company run. I work for a small department so I am a generalist in that I work on many different kinds of issues.

lender.name: Annie
lender.loan_because: I can! And a little bit here and a little bit there makes a difference. Helping people meet their needs and reach their goals makes me happy.

lender.name: Holly
lender.loan_because: It's sane and humane.
lender.occupational_info: I work with teenagers in the public library.

lender.name: Jayne
lender.loan_because: I like to help any willing to work!

lender.name: francis
lender.loan_because: I believe in self reliance, and I enjoy helping people attain it.

lender.name: Tiska
lender.loan_because: I live in abundance as an American and I want to help others who weren\'t born to the privilege that I was. I am not financially wealthy, but still want to share. I love connecting to these folks who are working to make things better for themselves and others.
lender.occupational_info: I want to express a spiritual essence through art and my life. I want to communicate with the use of colored pencils, sumi-e ink, and acrylic paints. I want to experience with others the meaning of serentity.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I believe in the concept of giving people opportunity
lender.occupational_info: I run a company that manufactures theatrical stage drapery and theatre rigging and hire many women and minorities

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: Kiva is a great way to make a difference. I have told my students about it and many are getting involved themselves. Life is too short not to do some good when you can. And, it makes you feel great!

lender.name: Tiago Alves
lender.loan_because: I feel good about it and because during my MBA at the University of San Francisco we had Kiva's President as a guest and I recorded his presentation for my podcast.
lender.occupational_info: Promoting HP OpenCall Services around the world.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: Because, to help someone help themselves is the right thing to do...
lender.occupational_info: I make medicines to help treat or cure diseases

lender.name: Laurel
lender.loan_because: I give because I believe in the power of giving. I am fortunate and I want to share my fortunes with others who need them and want to use them to enrich their community.
lender.occupational_info: The company I work for helps workers find resources for childcare, eldercare, education etc.

lender.name: Pat
lender.loan_because: Before retiring I worked for a non-profit that trained and loaned money to low income women entrepreneurs in my area. Kiva provides me the opportunity to continue helping entrepreneurs in need.

lender.name: Katina
lender.loan_because: I have more than I need.
lender.occupational_info: Redeveloping an urban area (downtown Boise Idaho, USA) by creating housing and jobs.

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of business to make the world a better place.

lender.name: SHIRAZ
lender.loan_because:
I believe in empowering others to achieve self-sufficiency.
Friends viewing this page who are unfamiliar with Kiva: Please note that the beauty of micro-finance donations is in that your "seed donation money" can be used to help more than the original recipient. Once the short-term loan is paid back into your Kiva account, you can re-loan the money to someone else in need. Unlike other "conventional" forms of charitable donation, this is truly a gift that keeps on giving. I love the idea of helping people reach their financial goals

lender.name: Jefferey
lender.loan_because: My wife and I have supported a number of worthwhile international charities. However, Kiva.org seems like it offers of the most efficient way to support people in need and who are willing to help themselves, their families and their communities.
lender.occupational_info: I provide legal services to entrepreneurs and growth-oriented businesses.

lender.name: Stern, Elkind & Curray
lender.loan_because: We firmly believe that given a chance everyone can excel in whatever they choose to do. We\'d like to provide that chance to as many individuals as possible...

lender.name: Erik
lender.loan_because: It's an easy and exciting and real way of helping. It also draws my attention to other parts of the world.
